values: So i love my best friend more then anything sara marie butkovich

Last week was about the worst week ever. Tuesday && Wednesday had the funeral. RIP<3333 Thursday went shopping. Friday after school, went back to Sar's for alittle, picked up megs, went out to dinner with her & my family then went to shopping, around 730 Sar picked us up went to my cousins chilled there, got food :D Dropped megs off- me && sar went back to her house have the funniest time in the kitchen ha. went to blockbuster, went back there and watched a movie, went home around 1. Had to wake up @ 6 in the morning, and head out to Brighton, for a breakfast benefit. Had fun. After that went to eastland with sar for a few. ilu Carrie took me out to eat for Sweetest Day :*:* then got ready, picked up megs, went to a halloween party. it was fun i guess watched the tigers only stayed an hour then sar picked us up, went back to Sammys. had a blast i guess you can say, lost in beer pong everytime =( the cops came, so i had aimee drop me off back at the halloween party i made my mom take me to tacobell && to get a slurpee. finally got home around 3, and fall asleep on the couch? dont remember :) Sunday, my parents woke me up @ 12, went shoppinggg<3 Then aimee came and got me, got coco went back to her house for the day came home around 10. this weekend was the best weekend in awhile. i love my girls<3333. i cant wait till Floridaaaaa babyyy :*:*:*

Havent updated this thing in forever. Im bored, sitting in second hour doing nothing. we have a foreign sub and shes annoying, besides that junk tonights powderpuff :D kinda excited kinda not but whatever. This past weekend, Friday went to the Game w/ aimee, Left there went to Caspers for alittle bit. Picked up Sar :* Went to Dereks party. it was alright, didnt drink, so wasnt that funnn. Glad i got to see Christie :* Went home around 1. Saturday slept in, it felt sooo good :) Got up around 3ish, got ready. Sar got me around 7; went back to her house. Went to sammy's around 9- Me, Sar, Sammy, Smith, Jordan, && Coleman all had to fit in his car. very uncomfortable; went to a haunted house. very scaryyy ;) i guess you could say. went back to sammys, then came home around 2. Sunday just layed around && watched football. and went to see a movie w/ aimee<3 Monday -went to the Game && Taco Bell. Tuesday - decorated jerseys with the girls, and went to practice. then went to Sammys w/ Sar, Smith Rocky, Jordan, and big jon to watch the tigers game<3 :) so happy they wonnn! Umm, me && my sister bought our tickets for Florida, Im so excited :D cant wait <3. Tomorrow, getting my eyebrows/Nails done && going tanning :) then suppose to go see Texas chainsaw? but who knows. this weekend def. getting drunk but im gonna stop going on about nothing. i love SAR :*:*

YUCK! havent updated in awhile this summer has not been the greatest, doesnt surpise me. Just got back f/ orentation with Sar :* so my 10th gradeee year, i fucked up pretty badd dont even wanna begin to explain, im a credit & a half downn. wonderful my sister left for college today. im the only child now :] i love my girls idk what i would do w/o them. && this update is pointless but yeaa. i m i s s y o u

this time, this place misused, mistakes too long, too late who was i to make you wait just one chance just one breath just in case there's just one left 'cause you know, you know, you know that i love you i have loved you all along and i miss you been far away for far too long i keep dreaming you'll be with me and you'll never go stop breathing if i don't see you anymore

Well i feel like writing in here for some reason so im Gonna.

This Past weeekkkenndd
Friday  Night Just went to Stefanie's Stayed the night there.
Satuurdayy - we actually got up early Went out to eat @ my aunts
resturanntt ah it was so good :D - then after went back to her house,
got Ready and all that great stuff, Went & Got Lauraaa

went back to Shane's house with Laura, Stefanie, Chandler,
and Brettley and Rob came over. boop
Chilled around the house - didnt feel to greatt :X hmm
left there around 12 - got taco bell, passed out @ stefs.
Woke up @ stefs - went to Wendi's - then To Lauras for alittle, 
sat around with the Giiirls, left there around 3ish, 
went back to Stefanie's got ready & all that junk.
Daviid & Laura came over; talked with them for alittle bit <3

came home and went to bed!

Got Brittany from school, went out to Stefanie's mothers work
driving on hall road for a good hour couldnt find it- FInally we got There.
left there around 6ish, Got G & Anggg - Went to My Cousin's place;
its soo Niiice :) - back to Stefanies; Robbie, Todd, Matthew and Shane came over.
Just basically chilled in Stefanie's room had alot of fun :) 
im glad todd amused his-self with basically making me feel the smallest person ever.
but they all Left, me, G, Ang, and SHane stayed the night @ stefs
i feel asleep early.

Woke up to G Leaviiiingg - then me ang and stef dropped Shane off @ hoomee;
Went out to lakesiiide - Dropped Ang off then i came home, Basically took a nap,
got ready alittle - Stef got me and ang, went to her chiropractier; stopped @ taco bell,
talked in stefanie's room with the giiirls - 
Jake, Matt, Casey, James, Joshh, Chris came ovverr Just chiilled in Stefanies room.
B.Swit came by; me and ang went out and talked with her -- iloveyou<3
went back in -- Then we all left; Stopped @ taco bell - Went to Josh's
so the guys could play Poker - um I talked on the computer;
Josh came & sat with me HAD SO MUCH FREAKIN FUN; ang joined us :)
i dont think we stopped laughin for a half hourrr
ahhh - Then matt turned the Chair and knocked over the freakin table,
it was the funniest thing; i dont think i laughed that much in awhile
me & ang tryed plamming it on Stefanie but she didnt fall for it 
i think we left there around 1ish, went back to stefanies, talked for a few,
then crashheed.
woke up aaround 7 to my sister calling me Shes freakin NUTS ! 
fell back asleeep - came home around 9.
Layed around - Took a nap ate with the Famiiily it was nice :D

stayin in for the night bein a BUMM !! :)

!!!!!!!

& going shoppping for my clothes; hopefully soon.

with us, i miss her so muchh <333

got alot of new memories with her! :D i loveyou<3

Welll I guesss I could update this since I havent in awhile .. Basketball is almost over, Our record is 6-4 noottt badd after a long 5 months of playing it. im not doing it next year - im done w/ it. Thhiiis Past weekenddd - // Friiday - Had no Basketball; went home w/ Laura, cleaned her rooom - Layed around all that good stuff. David made me watch some freakin crazy ass movie- I believe we came back to my house around 7ish -Mike and Shane came over, Chilled w/ them - Then went to See Saw 2 @ the MOvies, but couldnt get in and all that bullshit, so we went back to Laura's for a few, then went & Seen Emily Rose- Dumbest movie ive ever seen, got home around 12 - went to bed. // Saturday woke up around 3ish - Layed around till 8ish, got ready went to Shane's till around 2ish -watched The AmityVille Horror MY NEW FREAKIN FAVORITE MOVIE :) - came home went to bed. // Sunday got woken up @ 10 from Mike & Brettley, talked w/ them for a few - they left, me & laura couldnt fall back asleep, so i cleaned up my room- walked to the store, came back here layed around- <3 Around 9ish, went over Ashley's house; Coco was there too <3 - talked w/ them & watched tv, went to bed around 1030ish. Yesterday - hallowween; Had a really bad headahce; went to stefs for alittle, then just came home, basically watched scary movies. Today - happy birthday swit <33 Slept in, went in 3rd hour; Umm after school, Stefanie took me home; just got ready made fun, went back up to the school, Talked w/ people. - we had a home game WON PortHuron :D - After talked with Cait & Thres Love them GIRLS !! <333 - then got wendis and came home. F ri End S - well my & laura are stilll greatterr then ever :] i love her more and more everyday <333 i talked to Caitlin after my gamee !!! i seriously miss her more then anything; along with ANGELA & GINA. i sit across f/ Shannon @ Lunch & have her in first hour.. & we barely even talk hope that changes more =\ umm .. me and nina basically no clue; i was accused of something that i have no cluee of what i did - not bothering - staying out of dramma <33 pleasedontcommmentaboutanythingeither:) i love having brenda in my last hour - talkabouteverything :] ilovestefanielyngiardini<3 im glad me and samantha parennt talk more. i love having megs in my second hour :* keep updated on our lives. hope me and swit become closer <3 NIKKI - cant wait till next friday hope that folloows thru ;) Fa m ILY ewwwwwww - of course i love my mother; and my father all me & my sister do is fight, i can be stubborn sometimes learn to LIKE Me. --------------- Basketball Ends next week =\ wow having a girls night maybe next weekend. basketball bankquet - December 6th. Going to FLORIDA for thanksgiving :) i love having the upstairs roooom this weekend & next weekend should be fun :D But imma go - Leave me Some Commments :] happiness is a choice - you've got to work toward it

Well why im sitting here waiting for my sister to get me, ill update. -- Last night me & laura went to the Movies to see Mr. & Mrs. Smith, good moovie. -- Homecoming was good :D - the dance wasnt as fun as i thought it was gonna be but its all good, limo was GREAT :D Kjs + Stefanies had alot of fun <3 me & Laura came back here, around 330ish. -- Basketball is going Gooodd =) game tonight. also Parents night -- I love talking to Brenda in last hour. i need your work too ! :X -- Its niiice having 3rd Hour & Lunch w/ Ashley, but it seems we never go thru with our plans. hmm -- Gotta get my pictures developed sooon -- Nikki's ass needs to get ungrounded -- Im having a sweet 16. =) believe it -- Glad me and stefanie are talking and hanging out alot more. -- im in love with this new trina song. -- I love talking to megs; understands everything i tell her <33 -- I'd die without Laura -- Brettley's party Saturday. -- i wanna go upnoorthh -- Schools pretty fun sometimesss -- Kamie made me a Cd i love it // and i love her. -- Last Football game tomorrow -- Basketball ends in less then a month =\ -- I need to get my Grades up -- I believe my mother is going back in the hospital :(:( -- I missss some of my friiends But im going to Schoool :*

Well lets see whats been going on. !@$@%# -Schoool; well i like it -- alot i guess. My classes are all pretty smooth, Molnar is alittle weird for me, i dont like him that much, but i do like when he lets me sleep :* my last hour english, borse might be coming up :D --- but other then that, i hate that class thanks to my saver brenda & avery in there w/ me <33 i dont see laura that much tho. -Basketball; well our record isnt that good @ this point. but were still good, stuff happened tonight, im over it ... i just dont get some people umm .. i love herbertson !@#@%# <33 -Friends; Well alot of things have changed, You def. know who your true friends are. Laura miiiners is my best friend of course :] I can tell her anything & everything <333 of course i miss rafalskiii, but im used to the way things are now, and i hate them. but what can you doo <33 I love seeing Brittany Switanowski everydayyy i lovee her so much -- I love the giirls @ the lunch tabllee. I wish me & ninnna were cloooser <33 brennda <3 megs :* basketball brings us somewhat closer. hope we clooserr <33 -HomeComing; Still haavent went dress shoppinggggg. or any of that shiiit. still need to talk about the LIMO<3 [[niikkkiii]] lol. cant wait thoooo its gonna be ANOTHER one to remember :] :] This weekkk -- monday - basketball practice, nothing. tuesday - basketball game, shit happened. we didnt play wednesday - practice // then went to the movies with Laura today - game // lost, now here just writing in here. this weekkkend; Tomorrow Practiice, might be leaving early!?! Daviiidss birrthhdayy :* going to lauras for the niight i believe Saturday Daddiies Party :*:* bringing ashleyy[dont know if shes going for sure] & laura <333 - ---- well im happy i can bring drinks/food in first hour now :] --- that lockdown is gonna be great ha !%(@&% -- i love my first hour/third hour <33 - I miss lambo soo much. glad i see him here and there ---- frasher is a really good team let me tell you. --- i miss alyssssaa finnnger & deee - wanna talk to them more <33 -- I love driving to school with Stefanie & Jennnaa :]:] But immma gooo - lay down soon <33333 leave some commentttss

... Well havent wrote in this thing in awhile, so i'd thought i'd update. not that i do to much anyways. Well the First day of school went Good - even tho i went into wrong classes twice @%&@%*&@!$(&@ -- First hour, im one of the only Sopohmores :X sat by Lisa, Chels, and amanda ! <3 Second hour - Seems like its gonna be a Borringg class, but opal is in there my saver :] Thiiird - i can see we'll have fun .. With Noel RAFALSKI Sierrra KAYLA, amber, Lauren :] & even guys in there haa ! forth no one is in there !! but Ashley willis :] - Cody is the Student Teacher in there, 2ndd hour lunchhh -- fifth hour, i have AMANDA !!! and big jon, this should be funnn :] & jessy is right across the hall :) Last hour - with Brenda <3333 - After school, my sister took me & laura to 7 11 - then Back to Lauras, made davviid get up and take us to Tacobell, then we went back & went to bed :] Woke up around 4ish went up to the schoool - gameeee. Then went out to Diinnerrrr with mylove Now im hereee talking to DANIEL GOUIN WHo i miss !!!!! Basketball Is going pretty gooddd ha. I want Ashley Stephens on the team, i think i say that everyday !! We lost 3 games already. I LOVE SEEING TIM KYLE AND NIKKI EVERYDAY NOW :] i love themmmm <33 -- nikki we need to make plans. I love laura miiners of Course. But imma go this update was pointless but yeahhh i seen you today & it makes me miss you MORE

Yesterdayy // woke up @ lauras, layed around the house, her mother brought up Taco bell home :]:] then .. we decided to go to the gym, we were there for a feww hours - did some good work outs Cant wait to go Backk ! :) - after, my father picked us up, came back to my house I cleaned my room & Got ready then around 9ish, went back to hers, decided to havee a fire, Alex, Brandon, And J weezie came over, Alex set his-self on fiire, it was like something you'd see on Tv, They left, Matthew & Todd came over for alittle bit just sat & talked. They left around 12, i dont think me & Laura stopped laughin for an hour about the Dune Buggyyy .. lmao We went inside ateeee agaiiin Me Laura & dave have funnn eating our macroni & cheese at the table :] - we went back outsiiide till around 5 in the morningg. Then we came in, around 6 Davve says hes going to McDonalds Laura jumps up, so we went to Mickey D's & 711, got us slurrpees ;) - then we went back there, talked feel asleep around 8ish, We finally woke up around 5ish .. just basically layed around, i made macroni & cheese while laura went on her 10 house jog there and back loseeer i swear ;):) then I just sat & talked with Tim weber & daviid for alittle. Me & Laura walked up to 7.11. :) came back talked with a few people. Just went down to Kyles; chilled there with him Timmy, Nikki and Laura. Me & Nikki were on a team, Laura & timmy were on team -- we played ppool :] of course we won ;);) - After just sat there for a few. Left, went back to Lauras. Jarrod & Matthew stopped by; me and laura just played in the raiinn - around 1130ish they left, dave broought me home, now im just sitting here with Toddd talking about our Great liifes. -- well i talked to megs last night, i Seriously miss her. I know we arent that close anymore but @ times we are, we have our ups & downs, but no matter what im always gonna love her <333 We have to make plans sometime next WEEK ! :) :) Basketball starts thiiisss Week, im sorta happy for it :] -- Well mother went back in the hospital =\ I thought she was doing pretty well @ home, didnt look that way I miss her so muchhhh; cant talk to her on the phone. im sure this stuff is gonna go on for awhile, her coming home - then going back to the hospital =\ :( Wednesday Kelly Clarkston Cant waiittttt Friday HOPEFULLY state fairrr - to see the Game :) Saturday Woodward cruuiisseee :] I seen Gina toooniight, boy do i miss herrr =\ I miss Shannon Valls, Angela, Caitlin, Stefanie, Falicia, Stephanie, Brittany Switanowski, Aliissa, Niiiinaaa, Kayyllaa & A S H L E Y R A F A L S K I. oh & i miss talkin to matthew about everything. theres nothing really Going on in my life thats Big. hoping for my mother to get wellll !!!!!!!!!!!! & not fight with my SISTER or my father anymore. but imma go clean my room, hopefully start laundry soon, take a shower & out to breakfast with my father then Up to see my mother... My sleeping times are so offf =| leaveeee some commments :*:*

... I just redid my journal, im horribe @ these things. Sundayy went to Mickey D's around 7 in the mOrning with Dave, boy did laura jump up with her FOOD ! lmfao. fattasss finally went to bed around 9ish, woke up around 3ish, came home Changed Sarah came over, me her my dad and mother went to Davey's.. havin a BBq. for Sarah and mikes b-day. <3 just chilled there with Trevor, Bruce & His friend<333 Left there around 7ish - came home and slept! Yesterday me Laura & dave went out to Lakeside, me & laura didnt do much shopppingg.. bought nothing but food .. Stopped @ Starbucks and Dq on the way home :] went home and ateeeeee everything lmao. I went home around 11ish, just sat talkin on the computer all night. Today got up around 7ish with my mother, helpeed her outtt :] - Finally got in the shower around 2, when my dad got home, he took Me & Laura to the malll, we finnally shoppped :] after, just went home, played basketball in the street; Todd & Chris stopped by . tAlked with tim and mikey for alittle.
